SELECT des_id desId, des_gid desGid, des_info desInfo, des_mdPath desMdpath, des_smPath desSmPath, des_xsPath desXsPath, des_state desState, sb.book_id bookId, sb.book_name bookName, sb.book_sellingPrice bookSellingPrice, sb.book_isbn bookIsbn FROM sh_bookimagedescription AS des RIGHT JOIN sh_book AS sb ON des.des_gid = sb.book_id WHERE sb.book_state = 1 GROUP BY sb.book_id
